description.value:
Also at 3rd level, you learn an additional spell when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown in the Fey Wanderer Spells table. Each spell counts as a ranger spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of ranger spells you know.

Fey Wanderer Spells
Ranger Level Spell
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.TU1rTIejvenLb2tG]{Charm Person}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.8yienSU9GWw8t1us]{Misty Step}
9th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.vWLRarMk4QaoZjNv]{Dispel Magic}
13th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.m9ecvbgxX3lliiA9]{Dimension Door}
17th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.AZkW5P437g6AqZL7]{Mislead}

Note: When you add these spells to your character, set their Preparation Mode to Always Prepared.

You also possess a preternatural blessing from a fey ally or a place of fey power. Choose your blessing from the Feywild Gifts table or determine it randomly.

Feywild Gifts
d6 Gift
1 Illusory butterflies flutter around you while you take a short or long rest.
2 Fresh, seasonal flowers sprout from your hair each dawn.
3 You faintly smell of cinnamon, lavender, nutmeg, or another comforting herb or spice.
4 Your shadow dances while no one is looking directly at it.
5 Horns or antlers sprout from your head.
6 Your skin and hair change color to match the season at each dawn.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
